segments.text: Why is there no water coming out when you turn on the faucet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's just drip drip drip . But that's not water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . Since yesterday morning , the water pressure has dropped to a little more than a drip .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you call the apartment management yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I called and they said they'd send someone over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long ago did you do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's outrageous ! I just don't understand why they're not on top of this .
segments.speaker: S1
